name: PackYourStuff
description:
You are in the supermarket and the queue behind you is staring at you impatiently. Pack your stuff in your limited time before everyone starts hating you!

Use Mouse to Pick Stuff from the left and place in the grid on the right. Place all items in the grid to gain points.

Sometimes it is impossible, that is life.

Made for the Trijam #121 in 3 hours.
Check the Development Livestream here: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1031535504
